translation.en: [host 1 in Korean] Today is the debut of YG's newest girl group in seven years.
translation.zh: 时隔七年YG娱乐今天推出最新女团

translation.en: Introducing BLACKPINK!
translation.zh: 向大家介绍BLACKPINK！

translation.en: ♪ BLACKPINK… ♪
translation.zh: （三年后）

translation.en: [host 2 in Korean] Please give it up for BLACKPINK!
translation.zh: 请大家鼓掌欢迎BLACKPINK！

translation.en: [all together] Hello, we're BLACKPINK!
translation.zh: 大家好 我们是BLACKPINK

translation.en: [Michael Strahan in English] Our next guests are the best-charting female Korean group of all time.
translation.zh: 下面的嘉宾是史上最卖座的韩国女团

translation.en: …wildly popular K-pop group…
translation.zh: 超级受欢迎的韩国流行乐团体

translation.en: K-pop sensations, BLACKPINK!
translation.zh: 现象级韩国流行音乐团体BLACKPINK

translation.en: [reporter 1] BLACKPINK has become the highest charting K-pop girl group ever.
translation.zh: BLACKPINK已成为史上最卖座的韩国流行音乐女团

translation.en: [reporter 2] They also made history as they became
translation.zh: 她们还创造了历史

translation.en: the first K-pop girl group to perform at Coachella.
translation.zh: 成为第一个在科切拉音乐节演出的韩国流行音乐女团

translation.en: [host 3] Performing it live for the first time ever on US television,
translation.zh: 首次在美国电视直播演出

translation.en: here is BLACKPINK!
translation.zh: 这就是BLACKPINK

translation.en: -[host 4] BLACKPINK! -BLACKPINK!
translation.zh: -BLACKPINK！-BLACKPINK！

translation.en: [in Korean] Congratulations, BLACKPINK.
translation.zh: 祝贺你们 BLACKPINK

translation.en: [host 5] BLACKPINK!
translation.zh: 祝贺你们 BLACKPINK！

translation.en: -[Lisa] I'm so hungry. -[Jennie] Are you?
translation.zh: 我好饿 -你呢？-嗯

translation.en: -Did I eat something today? -[Lisa] No.
translation.zh: -我今天吃东西了吗？-没有

translation.en: There's a dessert. It's like a croissant with injeolmi.
translation.zh: 有甜点 像是羊角面包加麻薯

translation.en: You guys don't like injeolmi?
translation.zh: 你们不喜欢吃麻薯？

translation.en: It tastes really good. [giggles]
translation.zh: 很好吃！

translation.en: [Jennie] Every time a new album comes, we're just excited. We're like,
translation.zh: 每次有新专辑 我们就很兴奋

translation.en: "Ah, yay. Finally, one more," you know?
translation.zh: “哇 终于来了 又是一张”

translation.en: I think we're halfway there, maybe?
translation.zh: 我觉得已经完成一半了吧？

translation.en: We're always halfway there. We're like, "We have the songs…
translation.zh: 我们一向是已经完成了一半 我们的歌已经有了 只要录一下就行

translation.en: there. We just need to record them."
translation.zh: 我们的歌已经有了 只要录一下就行

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] Seeing so many people love our music
translation.zh: 看到有这么多人爱我们的音乐

translation.en: motivates us to try something new and different.
translation.zh: 促使我们想要尝试新的不一样的东西

translation.en: [in English] It's time for us to do some music. Yeah.
translation.zh: -咱们是时候做点音乐了-对

translation.en: [Jennie] We just have so much to show people.
translation.zh: 我们有很多要向大家展示

translation.en: I don't think we've done something really girly yet.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们没有做过很有女孩样的东西

translation.en: We've practiced and explored so many different things, um, during our trainee days,
translation.zh: 我们做练习生的时候练习并探索了很多不同的东西

translation.en: and so it's just a matter of how much of that we could end up showing as BLACKPINK.
translation.zh: 所以问题只是我们作为BLACKPINK能够展示出多少

translation.en: I think, for me, when I say girly, I want to do more like…
translation.zh: 我觉得 我说女孩样的东西 就是指…

translation.en: like… [softly] "Hello…"
translation.zh: 就像这样 你好…

translation.en: -[all giggle] -[Rosé] Like what?
translation.zh: 什么啊？

translation.en: [in Korean] Why is that delay so strong right now?
translation.zh: 为什么现在延迟这么厉害？

translation.en: Can you bring it down a bit?
translation.zh: 你能不能拉下来一点？

translation.en: Push it forward a bit.
translation.zh: 往前推一点

translation.en: [in English] I'm their producer, songwriter.
translation.zh: 我是她们的制作人 歌曲作者

translation.en: I've written and produced every single song that's come out so far.
translation.zh: 到现在为止出的所有歌都是我写的都是我制作的

translation.en: It's been about four years now.
translation.zh: 到现在已经大约四年了

translation.en: Our initial approach was more like… single, smash, single, hit.
translation.zh: 我们起初的方法更像是单曲 走红 单曲 大卖

translation.en: Now, we feel like we need to tell more of our personal story.
translation.zh: 现在 我们觉得需要更多地诉说我们自己的故事

translation.en: And I know the fans are mad. Like, "We want more and more."
translation.zh: 我知道粉丝们很生气会说：“我们要更多的歌”

translation.en: We do have a lot in here, but…
translation.zh: 我们这里确实有很多

translation.en: we're very particular with what we put out.
translation.zh: 但是要推出哪些歌 我们是很挑的

translation.en: [Rosé and Jennie in Korean] Hello!
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: [Jennie in English] Oppa, you got some leather jackets going on there?
translation.zh: 哥哥 你穿着皮夹克啊？

translation.en: [in Korean] Awesome!
translation.zh: 好棒！

translation.en: [in English] Stop acting like I overdressed today.
translation.zh: 别装得好像我今天穿过头了 好吗？

translation.en: I always dress like this.
translation.zh: 我每次都这么穿

translation.en: [in Korean] I should've had a nap today.
translation.zh: 我今天应该打个盹的

translation.en: -I'll slap your wrist. Sleepy right? -I didn't get a nap.
translation.zh: 我打一下你手心 还困吗？

translation.en: Better?
translation.zh: 好点了吧？

translation.en: [Teddy in English] So, I have the…
translation.zh: 嘎嘎小姐风格的BLACKPINK

translation.en: Lady Gaga featuring BLACKPINK that's about to come out.
translation.zh: 嘎嘎小姐风格的BLACKPINK 马上就要推出

translation.en: We worked hard before New Year's for this.
translation.zh: 我们在新年之前为这个练得很辛苦

translation.en: [Teddy] They're huge, and they're so successful.
translation.zh: 她们很轰动 很成功

translation.en: I don't think any of us even expected this.
translation.zh: 我们之中应该没人预料到

translation.en: Sometimes it gets to me, like, "Oh, my God."
translation.zh: 有时候我会觉得 神啊！

translation.en: How do we live up to this hype?
translation.zh: 我们怎么才配得上这样的宣传啊？

translation.en: Sour candy. [laughs]
translation.zh: 《酸糖果》

translation.en: -[exclaims] -[Jisoo in Korean] It's addictive.
translation.zh: 很上瘾

translation.en: [Teddy in Korean] Should we re-record certain parts of "Crazy Over You"?
translation.zh: 《疯狂地爱你》中的一些部分要不要重录？

translation.en: [Teddy in English] Every group has their own different cultural background
translation.zh: 每一个团体都有自己不同的文化背景

translation.en: that makes them who they are.
translation.zh: 让他们成为现在这样的人

translation.en: [Teddy] But the combination, that's what makes BLACKPINK unique
translation.zh: 但是这种组合 使BLACKPINK独一无二

translation.en: and stand out.
translation.zh: 脱颖而出

translation.en: [in Korean] Who thinks they can nail their part in this song?
translation.zh: 谁觉得自己可以搞定这首歌中自己那部分？

translation.en: [in English] Rosé, want to go in first for the intro?
translation.zh: 彩英 你要前奏先来吗？

translation.en: [Teddy] Rosé, a Korean girl that was raised in Australia.
translation.zh: 彩英 一个在新西兰长大的韩国姑娘

translation.en: And she stays here 'til, like, six o'clock a.m. just in the studio.
translation.zh: 她会在工作室待到早上六点

translation.en: Sometimes I'm like, "Wow! You still here?"
translation.zh: 有时我会说：“哇！你还在这里啊？”

translation.en: [in English] Ooh… you really killed that one.
translation.zh: 你这个真的厉害

translation.en: [Teddy] Jisoo. Straight-up Korean girl that grew up in Korea.
translation.zh: 智秀 率直的韩国姑娘 在韩国长大

translation.en: She's the unnie of the group. She's the oldest.
translation.zh: 她是团里的大姐 她年纪最大

translation.en: [Teddy] She does have that professional poker face.
translation.zh: 她确实有一副严肃的职业面孔

translation.en: I've known Jisoo for, let's say, a good six years.
translation.zh: 我认识智秀六年了

translation.en: I've seen her cry…
translation.zh: 我见她哭过…

translation.en: once.
translation.zh: 一次

translation.en: She's super smart.
translation.zh: 她特别聪明

translation.en: A lot of people might think she's book smart,
translation.zh: 很多人可能会说她读书聪明

translation.en: but I would say she's street smart.
translation.zh: 但我会说她有街头智慧

translation.en: -[rattling] -[in Korean] Oh, that scared me.
translation.zh: 噢 吓我一跳

translation.en: [Teddy in English] Lisa, from Thailand.
translation.zh: 拉莉莎 来自泰国

translation.en: She's always got that cool, calm,
translation.zh: 她总是有很酷、很冷静的微笑

translation.en: "it's gonna be okay, we're all good" smile.
translation.zh: 让大家觉得没事 我们都很好

translation.en: [Teddy] But when it comes to certain moments,
translation.zh: 但是在某些时候

translation.en: when the music starts, when it's crunch time,
translation.zh: 当音乐响起 压力巨大的时候

translation.en: she has this executioner killer instinct.
translation.zh: 她有决绝的杀手本能

translation.en: [Teddy in English] Jennie, born in Korea, but moved to New Zealand.
translation.zh: 珍妮 出生在韩国 但是搬去了新西兰

translation.en: She's super clear.
translation.zh: 她特别清楚

translation.en: Her opinions, her emotions.
translation.zh: 她的意见 她的情绪

translation.en: She's a perfectionist.
translation.zh: 她是一个完美主义者

translation.en: [Teddy] All those different cultures in one pot,
translation.zh: 这么多不同的文化融汇在一起

translation.en: it's just different how they walk, how they talk, and how they dress.
translation.zh: 她们走路、说话、穿衣都不一样

translation.en: And the perfect balance, how they complement each other.
translation.zh: 她们互相赞美 完美平衡

translation.en: It's fascinating.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: [Teddy] We're just Korean people trying to do music,
translation.zh: 我们就是一群韩国人努力地在做音乐

translation.en: so if Korean people make music, it's K-pop? I don't even get it. Like…
translation.zh: 所以如果韩国人做音乐就是韩国流行音乐？我搞不懂

translation.en: It's Korean pop.
translation.zh: 是韩国流行乐

translation.en: The only thing is language.
translation.zh: 唯一的问题是语言

translation.en: Why don't they do that for every country?
translation.zh: 为什么不为每个国家去做呢？

translation.en: What is K-pop?
translation.zh: 什么是韩国流行音乐？

translation.en: -[static] -K-pop.
translation.zh: 韩国流行音乐

translation.en: [reporter 1] K-pop is taking the US by storm.
translation.zh: 韩国流行音乐在席卷美国

translation.en: K-pop has become a worldwide cultural phenomenon.
translation.zh: 韩国流行音乐已成为世界范围的文化现象

translation.en: The genre has been around for at least two decades.
translation.zh: 这个类型已经存在了至少二十年

translation.en: [in Korean] This is a three-member group named Seo Taiji and Boys.
translation.zh: 这是一个三人组合名叫徐太志和孩子们

translation.en: Please welcome them.
translation.zh: 请欢迎他们

translation.en: [reporter 2 in Korean] Powerful rhythm and flash dances are the hallmarks of Seo Taiji's music.
translation.zh: 有力的节奏和闪亮的舞蹈是徐太志音乐的印记

translation.en: They sing well, look cool, and dance well.
translation.zh: 他们唱得好 样子酷 舞跳得也好

translation.en: The interest in Korean pop music is unusually high from foreigners.
translation.zh: 外国人对韩国流行音乐的兴趣异常高昂

translation.en: [reporter 3 in English] A few big music agencies
translation.zh: 几大音乐经纪公司

translation.en: began making these polished groups of singers, rappers, and dancers.
translation.zh: 开始打造这些由歌手说唱歌手和舞者组成的光鲜组合

translation.en: [reporter 4] One of the heavy-weight companies is YG Entertainment.
translation.zh: 业内的一个重量级公司是YG娱乐

translation.en: [reporter 5] …responsible for the insanely viral "Gangnam Style."
translation.zh: 爆火的《江南范儿》就是他们的作品

translation.en: [reporter 5 in English] The industry brings in billions of dollars a year.
translation.zh: 这个行业每年进账数以十亿美元计

translation.en: [reporter 6] Grooming these singers is an industry all in itself.
translation.zh: 这个行业自己培训歌手

translation.en: [reporter 7] Trainees can start as young as 11 years old.
translation.zh: 最小的练习生仅有11岁

translation.en: [reporter 8] They're raised together. They train together.
translation.zh: 他们在一起成长、训练

translation.en: [reporter 9] Perfecting every pitch. Mastering every move.
translation.zh: 完善每一个音高 掌握每一个动作

translation.en: [reporter 7] Stakes are high.  Some make their debut after just a few months' training.
translation.zh: 风险很大有的人仅训练几个月就出道了

translation.en: For others, it could be up to a decade.
translation.zh: 也有的会长达十年

translation.en: Many never make it to debut at all.
translation.zh: 许多人永远都没办法出道

translation.en: [Jennie in English] Preparing for a new album, that's definitely fun,
translation.zh: 为一张新专辑作准备 这绝对很有趣

translation.en: 'cause it's like trying to come up with something new,
translation.zh: 因为这就像要想出新的东西

translation.en: but fittings like this,
translation.zh: 但是像这样的配饰

translation.en: it is one of the biggest, like, creative parts that we do.
translation.zh: 是我们最有创新的部分之一

translation.en: [Jennie in Korean] You look naturally sexy!
translation.zh: 你看起来性感得好自然！

translation.en: -Really! -You can't help yourself!
translation.zh: -真的！-你情不自禁了！

translation.en: [Rosé] If we wear something, we all try to see how it fits as a group,
translation.zh: 我们穿戴的时候会考虑作为一个整体是否合适

translation.en: but that's-- Well, it's case by case.
translation.zh: 但这是要具体问题具体分析

translation.en: [in English] It takes a long time.
translation.zh: 会花很多时间

translation.en: [in Korean] Shouldn't we make it a bit tighter? What do you think?
translation.zh: 不过咱们是不是应该弄紧一点？你觉得呢？

translation.en: -Because this side goes up. -[woman] Mm-mm-mm.
translation.zh: 因为这边会上去

translation.en: [in English] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Jennie] Lisa! Lalisa!
translation.zh: 拉莉莎！

translation.en: [Jennie in Korean] Lisa has diverse tastes.
translation.zh: 拉莉莎有很多不同的品味

translation.en: -[in English] She can wear whatever. -She pulls off anything.
translation.zh: -她想穿什么就穿什么-对 她穿什么都没问题

translation.en: [Rosé] It's so hard to define style.
translation.zh: 定义风格非常难

translation.en: I don't think there's any, like, boundaries within that.
translation.zh: 我觉得里面没有界限

translation.en: We don't go, "This is Korean, and this is Western. This is Asian."
translation.zh: 我们不会说：“这是韩式的这是西式的 这是亚洲的”

translation.en: I think fashion is really just international.
translation.zh: 我认为史上真的是国际的

translation.en: The more that there aren't any boundaries, I think that's when you can get creative.
translation.zh: 我觉得 越是没有界限你越能发挥创意

translation.en: And since we do crazy choreography on stage,
translation.zh: 因为我们在舞台上的编舞非常疯狂

translation.en: it all has to be really engineered, basically.
translation.zh: 所以都要设计得很好

translation.en: Make sure nothing flops out anywhere.
translation.zh: 对 确保不出问题

translation.en: -[Rosé] Yeah. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -[in Korean] What's this? -Coachella.
translation.zh: -这是什么？-科切拉音乐节

translation.en: [Jennie] I missed my note at the "eh."
translation.zh: 我有一个地方走调了

translation.en: See, this is why we can't watch our old footage.
translation.zh: 看吧 所以说咱们不能看以前的视频

translation.en: We're like, "You missed your note at the 'eh',"
translation.zh: 我们会说：“你这里走调了

translation.en: and, "I should've gone slower at this part of the choreography,
translation.zh: 你跳舞的时候 应该这样做

translation.en: but I did it too quickly."
translation.zh: -但是你做得太快了”-我走调了

translation.en: I missed my note. That wasn't good.
translation.zh: -但是你做得太快了”-我走调了 不行

translation.en: We were so nervous…
translation.zh: 我们当时太紧张了

translation.en: [in English] Yeah. If anything, it's stressful.
translation.zh: 对 当时压力太大

translation.en: Sometimes if something's not working, or I'm not doing my best performance,
translation.zh: 有时候如果有的方面不行或者我的表现不是最好

translation.en: it can be stressful.
translation.zh: 就可能压力很大

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] Compared to other stages,
translation.zh: 和其他舞台相比这里的压力要大得多

translation.en: it was much more overwhelming because we were so nervous.
translation.zh: 和其他舞台相比这里的压力要大得多 因为我们非常紧张

translation.en: [Jennie] For us, it was our first time in a country we weren't familiar with.
translation.zh: 对我们来说 这是我们第一次在美国这个不熟悉的地方表演

translation.en: I used to dream of that day when we were trainees.
translation.zh: 我们做练习生的时候我会梦想这一天

translation.en: -This is it. -This is it.
translation.zh: -实现了-实现了

translation.en: I always avoid interviews or any questions about me
translation.zh: 我总是避免访问避免关于我们的问题

translation.en: because I would rather not talk about myself, but…
translation.zh: 因为我宁愿不要谈我自己 但是…

translation.en: [woman in Korean] Jennie's personality?
translation.zh: 珍妮的性格？

translation.en: At first, it was hard getting to know her,
translation.zh: 起初 要了解她不容易 但是一旦熟悉了之后

translation.en: but once we became close,
translation.zh: 但是一旦熟悉了之后

translation.en: I could tell that she's very loyal, very sweet, and a lovely friend.
translation.zh: 我能看出她非常忠诚人很好 是一个很可爱的朋友

translation.en: I see her every day, so I'm used to her, and she's like my little sister.
translation.zh: 我每天都和她见面 习惯了她就像我妹妹一样

translation.en: But when I see her on TV, I'm like, "Ah, Jennie is a star,”
translation.zh: 但是当我在电视上看到她的时候我会觉得：“啊！珍妮是明星！”

translation.en: but she's really down-to-earth.
translation.zh: 但她真的很接地气

translation.en: -[Jennie breathes deeply] -[Jessie] You're doing so well.
translation.zh: 你做得非常好

translation.en: [Jennie in English] She's my friend. One of few that I have.
translation.zh: 她是我的朋友 我的朋友并不多

translation.en: -[groans] -[in Korean] Slowly. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 慢一点

translation.en: We're going to lift one leg up and do an arabesque.
translation.zh: 我们要把一条腿抬起来摆出阿拉贝斯舞姿

translation.en: [in English] I'm always aching after tours and stuff.
translation.zh: 巡回演出之后 我总会觉得疼

translation.en: I feel like, out of all the members, I'm always sick. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我觉得在所有团员中 我总是生病

translation.en: You know, some days, just like every other human being,
translation.zh: 在有的日子里 就像其他所有人一样

translation.en: you feel extra happy.
translation.zh: 你会感到特别高兴

translation.en: And some other days, you're feeling down.
translation.zh: 而有的日子里 你会觉得感到低落

translation.en: Singing, dancing, and rapping, I always enjoy it all the time,
translation.zh: 唱歌 跳舞 说唱 我总是很喜欢

translation.en: but we always have to be on stage
translation.zh: 但是我们总是得在舞台上

translation.en: looking perfect and performing the same thing.
translation.zh: 显出非常完美的样子表演相同的内容

translation.en: It's like working out for two hours every day.
translation.zh: 就像每天锻炼两小时

translation.en: It never gets easy.
translation.zh: 永远都不会变轻松

translation.en: Gets harder, actually, 'cause you age. [laughs]
translation.zh: 其实会变得更辛苦 因为年龄会增大

translation.en: I was born in Korea.
translation.zh: 我出生在韩国

translation.en: It's just me and my mom. I'm the only child.
translation.zh: 只有我和妈妈 我是唯一的孩子

translation.en: I was raised in Seoul until I was ten.
translation.zh: 十岁之前我在首尔长大

translation.en: I went to Australia and New Zealand to travel with my mom,
translation.zh: 我陪妈妈一起去了澳大利亚和新西兰

translation.en: and by the time we got to New Zealand,
translation.zh: 我们到新西兰的时候

translation.en: it was so nice and peaceful.
translation.zh: 那里很不错 非常宁静

translation.en: She asked me, "How do you feel about living here?"
translation.zh: 她问我：“你觉得在这里生活怎么样？”

translation.en: And I said, "Yeah, I would like that."
translation.zh: 我说：“好啊 我喜欢”

translation.en: So, from ten to 15, I was in New Zealand by myself.
translation.zh: 所以从十岁到十五岁我自己待在新西兰

translation.en: I never really got to spend so much time in the house with my mom…
translation.zh: 我从没有真正和我妈一起在家很久

translation.en: until recently.
translation.zh: 直到最近才有了变化

translation.en: [Jennie] I did a homestay.
translation.zh: 我当时寄宿在别人家里

translation.en: I got to just run around, learn so many things.
translation.zh: 我能到处跑 学了很多东西

translation.en: [young Jennie in Korean] I understand English better than when I began.
translation.zh: 我的英文比一开始的时候更好了

translation.en: In the beginning, my friends helped me a lot
translation.zh: 开始的时候 我的朋友们帮了我很多

translation.en: and showed me their notes. Now I can do it by myself.
translation.zh: 让我看他们的笔记 我现在可以自己做笔记了

translation.en: [Jennie in English] They have classes in school to go out,
translation.zh: 学校里有到外面去的课

translation.en: go camping, go learn instruments. If you want, do art.
translation.zh: 去露营、学乐器、做艺术如果你想参加的话

translation.en: Everything was up to you.
translation.zh: 一切都由你来决定

translation.en: Even if you're ten, you still got to make your own decisions.
translation.zh: 即便你十岁 你还是可以自己作决定

translation.en: That was very important for me to have at a young age.
translation.zh: 这对年少时的我非常重要

translation.en: That built me as who I am right now.
translation.zh: 这把我塑造成了我现在的样子

translation.en: I am super shy.
translation.zh: 我特别害羞

translation.en: I was one of those people where I can't even order something on the phone.
translation.zh: 我属于那种连用电话点单都不敢的人

translation.en: Like, I hated that.
translation.zh: 我非常讨厌这样

translation.en: [Jennie in English] Took me a while to get this far.
translation.zh: 我花了一段时间在走到现在这一步

translation.en: [Jennie] When I turned 15, I was deciding whether I should move to America.
translation.zh: 当我15岁的时候我要决定是否搬去美国

translation.en: I went there, I checked the school out. Everything was kind of decided, like 80%.
translation.zh: 我去了美国 看了一下学校一切都差不多决定好了 80%吧

translation.en: And I came back to New Zealand to pack my stuff up,
translation.zh: 然后我回了新西兰收拾东西

translation.en: and that's when I realized I don't want to go to America
translation.zh: 这时我意识到 我不想去美国 再去自己一个人学习

translation.en: and do another study there by myself.
translation.zh: 我不想去美国 再去自己一个人学习

translation.en: I actually want to become a singer. I don't know where it came from.
translation.zh: 我居然想当歌手了我也不知道这想法是哪儿来的

translation.en: [Jennie] As soon as I came back, I did an audition. And luckily, I got in right away.
translation.zh: 我一回来 就参加了一次试镜很幸运 我马上就被选上了

translation.en: I was like, "Wow! These people are so in to it!"
translation.zh: 我心想：“哇！这些人好专注啊！

translation.en: "They know what they're doing." I was like, "Let's catch up."
translation.zh: 他们很厉害 要迎头赶上啊”

translation.en: That's all I had in mind.
translation.zh: 我心里全都在想这些

translation.en: ♪ I only call you When it's half past five ♪ ♪ The only time that I can call you… ♪
translation.zh: （2015年 珍妮已受训五年）

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] So pretty!
translation.zh: 好漂亮！

translation.en: [Jennie in Korean] Oh, that’s really long ago.
translation.zh: 哎 这正是很久以前了

translation.en: I used to do a lot of dark and strong songs.
translation.zh: 我以前唱很多黑暗而强烈的歌

translation.en: So I often wonder, "What am I doing right now?"
translation.zh: 所以我经常会想：“我现在在干嘛？”

translation.en: It's so different from what I do now. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 和我现在做的非常不同

translation.en: -[Lisa] Your gestures! -[Rosé] You're always so cool.
translation.zh: -洁西！-你好酷啊！

translation.en: [Jennie in English] It's sad to say, the very first group of people that trained with me,
translation.zh: 说起来挺难过的和我一起受训的第一批人

translation.en: none of them are here with me right now.
translation.zh: 现在没有一个和我一起在这里

translation.en: And as soon as Lisa came in, that's when I thought…
translation.zh: 当拉莉莎加入的时候 我心想

translation.en: [in Korean] "Wow, there are people born to do this."
translation.zh: “哇 有的人是天生干这个的”

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] My role… I'm a rapper and also the lead dancer.
translation.zh: 我的角色是说唱歌手 也是领舞

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: [in English] Oh, this is cute.
translation.zh: 噢 这个好可爱

translation.en: [in Korean] I love vintage clothes.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢古董服装

translation.en: So wherever I go, whether it be America or anywhere else,
translation.zh: 所以不论我去哪里不论是美国还是其他地方

translation.en: I try to look for vintage shops.
translation.zh: 我都会去找古董服装店

translation.en: [in English] Oh, wow. Voilà!
translation.zh: 哇！好棒！

translation.en: [in Korean] This is 1.1 million.
translation.zh: 这件110万韩元

translation.en: -And this is 320,000. -And this one?
translation.zh: -这件32万-这件呢？

translation.en: This is 1.1 million?
translation.zh: 这件110万？

translation.en: Yes, because it's from the early '90s.
translation.zh: 对 因为是90年代早期的

translation.en: [in English] This is so cool!
translation.zh: 这好酷啊！

translation.en: Can I-- Can I get this? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我能买这个吗？

translation.en: [in Korean] My mom manages my finances.
translation.zh: 我妈帮我管钱

translation.en: [in English] She's gonna be like, "No, Lisa, no. Stop shopping for now."
translation.zh: 她会说：“不行 拉莉莎 先别买了”

translation.en: She's always like that, but I don't really listen to her.
translation.zh: 她总是这样 不过我其实不听她的

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mom. [giggles]
translation.zh: 对不起 妈妈

translation.en: When I was born.
translation.zh: 我在这一年出生

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] I was born in Thailand.
translation.zh: 我出生在泰国

translation.en: [in Thai] I was born in Buriram Province.
translation.zh: 武里南府

translation.en: Then I moved to Bangkok when I was three.
translation.zh: 然后我三岁时搬去了曼谷

translation.en: My auntie had a music group,
translation.zh: 我阿姨当时有一个乐团

translation.en: so they had mic stands, and I always played with them.
translation.zh: 所以他们有麦克风架我总会和他们一起玩

translation.en: I would lower it until it was the same height as me.
translation.zh: 我会把架子放低直到我长到和架子一样高

translation.en: Then I would just dance and sing to myself.
translation.zh: 然后我会跳舞和唱歌 只给我自己看

translation.en: That was how my mom knew I loved dancing.
translation.zh: 我妈就是这样知道我很喜欢跳舞

translation.en: So she signed me up for a course when I was in kindergarten.
translation.zh: 于是 我在幼儿园的时候她就给我报课程

translation.en: [Lisa] That was how it all began.
translation.zh: 一切就是这样开始的

translation.en: [Lisa] She signed me up to many contests…
translation.zh: 她给我报了很多比赛

translation.en: [in English] …dance competition and stuff.
translation.zh: 跳舞比赛等

translation.en: [in Thai] How long have you been practicing break dancing?
translation.zh: 你跳霹雳舞多久了？

translation.en: For a long time.
translation.zh: 很久了

translation.en: [Lisa] I participated in a contest. I was around 12 or 13 years old then.
translation.zh: 我参加了一个比赛当时我大概十二三岁

translation.en: Then a talent scout told me to try singing and asked if I wanted to be a singer.
translation.zh: 然后一个星探让我尝试唱歌问我想不想做歌手

translation.en: Then I realized that I loved both singing and dancing.
translation.zh: 然后我发现我既喜欢跳舞也喜欢唱歌

translation.en: And YG happened to have an audition at the time.
translation.zh: 当时YG娱乐刚好有一次试镜

translation.en: So, I made a decision.
translation.zh: 于是我作了决定

translation.en: [in English] Okay. I should try, for sure.
translation.zh: 好 我一定要试试

translation.en: [Jennie in Korean] Is this an audition?
translation.zh: 这是试镜？

translation.en: [Jisoo] How many layers are you wearing? Why are you wearing pants on top too?
translation.zh: 你穿了多少件啊？你为什么裤子外面还要穿裤子？

translation.en: -What is this? -[Rosé] Oh, wow!
translation.zh: 这是什么啊？

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[Rosé] This is amazing. Wow!
translation.zh: -天哪！-太棒了！

translation.en: You look so cool. [Lisa] I'm trying so hard to be cool.
translation.zh: -你看起来好酷啊！-我在很努力地要酷一点

translation.en: [in Thai] After the audition ended… [in Korean] …I waited for the call.
translation.zh: 试镜结束后 我等电话

translation.en: I was waiting and waiting. [in Thai] I waited for the call.
translation.zh: 我不断地等啊等

translation.en: I waited for two months!
translation.zh: 我等了两周

translation.en: And then they called me. I was like, "What? Is this possible?"
translation.zh: 然后他们给我打电话我心想：“啊？真的吗？”

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] I was a mama's girl.
translation.zh: 我以前是个妈宝女

translation.en: So, when I had to go to Korea without Mom,
translation.zh: 所以当我要离开妈妈去韩国时

translation.en: I felt that I had to take care of myself now.
translation.zh: 我感觉到 现在我得自己照顾自己了

translation.en: [in English] I was 14.
translation.zh: 我当时14岁

translation.en: Such a kid.
translation.zh: 还是个小孩

translation.en: [in Korean] I didn't speak any Korean.
translation.zh: 当时不会说韩语

translation.en: I only knew how to say "hello," so it really was a new start.
translation.zh: 我当时只会说“你好”所以确实是一个新的开始

translation.en: [in English] ♪ I'm in the club High off purp', with some shades on… ♪
translation.zh: （2013年 拉莉莎已受训两年）

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Fortunately, there was Jennie.
translation.zh: 很幸运 有珍妮在

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] She was the only one who could speak English among the trainees.
translation.zh: 她是当时练习生中唯一会说英语的

translation.en: I spoke English with her…
translation.zh: 我跟她说英语

translation.en: [in Korean] …and if something were to happen, I would talk to her.
translation.zh: 如果有什么事 我会和她说

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] That's it.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: [in English] However you feel comfortable. Like…
translation.zh: 只要你觉得舒服就行

translation.en: [in Korean] You choose how to sing it because we're all doing it differently.
translation.zh: 你选择怎么去唱因为我们在都用不同的方法去唱

translation.en: -[Teddy] There you go. -Okay.
translation.zh: -去吧-好的

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] A great thing with us
translation.zh: 我们很好的一个方面是

translation.en: is everyone wants the best for the group as a whole.
translation.zh: 每一个人都想为集体好 为组合好

translation.en: [Teddy] That's cool. I'm happy with that.
translation.zh: 很好 我满意

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Jisoo] Since we perform as a group,
translation.zh: 既然我们是作为一个组合来表演

translation.en: we try to strike a balance that works for everyone.
translation.zh: 我们就要尽量达到大家都能接受的平衡

translation.en: I think.
translation.zh: 我觉得是这样

translation.en: [Jisoo] What's up? What's up?
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: [woman in Korean] Sit here, Jisoo.
translation.zh: 坐这里 智秀

translation.en: [Jisoo] What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: Do you think I'll be able to learn today?
translation.zh: 你觉得我今天能学会吗？

translation.en: I think it’ll be nice to learn how to draw my eyebrows properly.
translation.zh: 我觉得如果学会怎么给我自己画眉毛 那就太好了 （李明善 化妆师）

translation.en: If you show me, I'll follow it.
translation.zh: 如果你画给我看 我会照着学

translation.en: -Okay. -I'm learning from you today.
translation.zh: 我今天跟你学

translation.en: Do you teach makeup like this too?
translation.zh: 你会这样教吗？

translation.en: -[Myungsun] To regular people? Yes. -Really?
translation.zh: -教其他人？会的-真的？

translation.en: -There are classes for that? -Of course!
translation.zh: 有这种课吗？

translation.en: I should've taken those classes then. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那我早就应该来学了

translation.en: There are people who come to learn BLACKPINK makeup.
translation.zh: 会有人来学BLACKPINK的妆

translation.en: -BLACKPINK makeup? -Yes.
translation.zh: BLACKPINK的妆？

translation.en: [Jisoo] When I was younger,
translation.zh: 我年纪小一点的时候

translation.en: my relatives treated me like an outcast because I was ugly.
translation.zh: 我的亲戚们把我当外人因为我以前很丑

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Jisoo] They called me a monkey.
translation.zh: 他们叫我猴子

translation.en: It's okay. You're the prettiest one now.
translation.zh: 没事 你现在是最漂亮的了

translation.en: [Jisoo] I grew up in Sanbon in Gunpo city, Gyeonggi-do region.
translation.zh: 我在京畿道军浦市山本洞长大

translation.en: I lived with my parents,  my sister, my brother, and my grandparents.
translation.zh: 和我父母、兄弟姐妹还有爷爷奶奶一起生活

translation.en: I'm living a very different life
translation.zh: 我现在过的生活

translation.en: than the one I thought I'd be living.
translation.zh: 和我以前想象的不一样

translation.en: I used to want to be a writer or a painter.
translation.zh: 我曾想要做一个作家或者画家

translation.en: Although, I couldn't paint well.
translation.zh: 虽然我画画不好

translation.en: And then I joined the drama club in 11th grade.
translation.zh: 后来 我在11年级的时候加入了戏剧俱乐部

translation.en: Should I try acting?
translation.zh: 我应该尝试表演吗？

translation.en: They were saying I should start auditioning for stuff
translation.zh: 他们说我应该去试镜

translation.en: because I needed the experience.
translation.zh: 因为我需要经验

translation.en: [Jisoo] My first audition was at YG.
translation.zh: 我第一次试镜是在YG娱乐

translation.en: I didn't know much at all about YG before I arrived there the first day.
translation.zh: 在我来之前 不太了解YG娱乐

translation.en: It felt like something far removed from me.
translation.zh: 我觉得好像是离我很遥远的东西

translation.en: I never thought I'd actually be doing it for real.
translation.zh: 我从没想到会真的做这一行

translation.en: How about now? Do you think I really lost my baby fat?
translation.zh: 现在呢？你真的觉得我没有婴儿肥了吗？

translation.en: Back then, it was more baby-like here…
translation.zh: 之前 这里会有些婴儿肥

translation.en: I guess I'll just have to eat ramen before I sleep tonight. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 今天睡觉之前 我大概只能吃拉面了

translation.en: Maybe then you'll get your old self back.
translation.zh: 这样你也许能找回以前的自己

translation.en: No, you're perfect right now.
translation.zh: 不过不行 你现在漂亮了

translation.en: Anyways, you were like a baby back then.
translation.zh: 你以前很纯

translation.en: But you're different from back then, too.
translation.zh: 但是你也和以前不一样了

translation.en: -[laughs] -You have your own shop!
translation.zh: 你现在有自己的店了！

translation.en: Who told you to open your own shop?
translation.zh: 谁让你自己开店的？

translation.en: Say it! Who told you to?
translation.zh: 说！是谁？

translation.en: You did.
translation.zh: 是你

translation.en: It was my big plan.
translation.zh: 那是我的大谋略

translation.en: And I'm still planning big things.
translation.zh: 我现在还在想大谋略

translation.en: I think that there are very few who truly think,
translation.zh: 我觉得很少有人会这的这么想

translation.en: "This is what I have to do. This is my path."
translation.zh: “我必须做现在的事 这是我的路”

translation.en: People like that are really lucky.
translation.zh: 在我看来 这样的人很幸运

translation.en: I don't think there are many like that.
translation.zh: 我觉得这样的人不多

translation.en: [Rosé in English] I have a really hard time falling asleep.
translation.zh: 我很不容易入睡

translation.en: I have a lot of thoughts running through my head.
translation.zh: 我脑子里会想很多事

translation.en: And singing is kind of like stress relief,
translation.zh: 唱歌有点像在释放压力

translation.en: and everything just kind of makes sense when I'm doing this.
translation.zh: 我唱歌的时候 一切似乎就都想通了

translation.en: I didn't think I could ever perfect that one. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我觉得我不可能把这首歌唱完美了

translation.en: Sometimes, I actually have missed my trainee days.
translation.zh: 有时候 我其实会想念我做练习生时的日子

translation.en: Because, back then, we were surrounded by music all the time.
translation.zh: 因为 在那个时候我们整天都被音乐围绕

translation.en: But these days we've got a lot of work, so I actually have to make time for this.
translation.zh: 但现在 我们有很多工作所以我其实得挤时间来练歌

translation.en: That's why it's always at night, when I'm supposed to be sleeping.
translation.zh: 所以总是在夜里夜里本来是该睡觉的

translation.en: Hi, girls and boys.
translation.zh: 你们好 男孩女孩们

translation.en: I'm called Roseanne…
translation.zh: 我叫彩英

translation.en: and I just woke up.
translation.zh: 我刚睡醒

translation.en: And welcome to Pajama News.
translation.zh: 欢迎收听睡衣新闻

translation.en: [Rosé] I was born in New Zealand.
translation.zh: 我出生在新西兰

translation.en: And then I moved to Australia when I was eight.
translation.zh: 然后我八岁时搬去了澳大利亚

translation.en: Back then, I was always on the piano.
translation.zh: 当时 我总是在弹钢琴

translation.en: I'd like sit there, and I'd play this lullaby for myself,
translation.zh: 我会坐在那里 给自己弹摇篮曲

translation.en: but I'd be really sleepy, and I'd fall asleep,
translation.zh: 但是我会非常困 快睡着的样子

translation.en: and then I'd put my chin on my knee.
translation.zh: 然后我会把下巴搁在膝盖上

translation.en: I went to church every Sunday and had a lot of Korean friends there.
translation.zh: 我以前每周日去教堂那里有很多韩国朋友

translation.en: But then at school, I was just a normal Australian kid.
translation.zh: 但是在学校里我就是一个普通的澳大利亚小孩

translation.en: -[man] Congratulations, Rosé. -[audience clapping]
translation.zh: 祝贺你 彩英

translation.en: [Rosé] And I think I enjoyed having two lives.
translation.zh: 我想我当时很享受两种生活

translation.en: Kind of like Hannah Montana. [laughs]
translation.zh: 有点像汉娜·蒙塔娜

translation.en: It's funny.
translation.zh: 很有趣

translation.en: [Rosé] My dad saw on the news that YG was coming to Australia.
translation.zh: 我爸在新闻里看到YG娱乐要来澳大利亚

translation.en: He was like, "Rosé, do you wanna audition?"
translation.zh: 他说：“彩英 你想去试镜吗？”

translation.en: And I was so shocked.
translation.zh: 我当时很震惊

translation.en: I think I asked him, "Do I like music? Do I?"
translation.zh: 我想我问他说：“我喜欢音乐吗？喜欢吗？”

translation.en: And he's like, "Yeah, obviously."
translation.zh: 他说：“当然喜欢

translation.en: "You're gonna have to, you know, try do something about it."
translation.zh: 你得去尝试一下

translation.en: "Otherwise you're gonna be 25,
translation.zh: 否则到了你25岁的时候

translation.en: and you're gonna regret that you didn't try anything."
translation.zh: 你会后悔什么都没尝试过”

translation.en: [Rosé] I was 16.
translation.zh: 我当时16岁

translation.en: Then I went and auditioned, and then they called me,
translation.zh: 然后我去试镜 之后他们给我打电话

translation.en: and they were like, "Can you fly to Korea within two months?"
translation.zh: 他们说：“你能在两个月内飞来韩国吗？”

translation.en: [Rosé] And then my whole life changed.
translation.zh: 然后 我的整个人生就改变了

translation.en: I dropped out of school.
translation.zh: 我从学校退学

translation.en: In Australia, I dropped out of school.
translation.zh: 在澳大利亚 我从学校退学

translation.en: I had never even imagined myself living apart from my family.
translation.zh: 我之前从没想过自己会离开家人去生活

translation.en: I hadn't even slept more than two weeks out of home.
translation.zh: 我甚至没有在外面住超过两个月

translation.en: It was a really-- Oh, my gosh. I'm gonna cry.
translation.zh: 真的是… 天哪！我要哭了

translation.en: I'm gonna cry.
translation.zh: 我要哭了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: The first night in the dorm,
translation.zh: 在宿舍的第一个晚上

translation.en: they were all in the same room.
translation.zh: 她们都在一个房间

translation.en: Everybody was sleeping.
translation.zh: 大家都睡了

translation.en: [in Korean] She brought a guitar from Australia, and I was like,
translation.zh: 她从澳大利亚带来一把吉他 我说：“给我们弹首曲子”

translation.en: "Play something for us." [laughs]
translation.zh: 我说：“给我们弹首曲子”

translation.en: [in English] It was us four. I don't even know why,
translation.zh: 当时就是我们四个我都不知道为什么

translation.en: but it was us four.
translation.zh: 但就是我们四个

translation.en: We covered songs 'til morning.
translation.zh: 我们唱歌 直到早上

translation.en: All four of us, we were singing. Somebody was harmonizing.
translation.zh: 我们四个人 一直在唱歌有人唱和声

translation.en: I think Jisoo was harmonizing.
translation.zh: 应该是智秀在唱和声

translation.en: It was so funny. Can you believe it?
translation.zh: 很有趣 难以置信吧？

translation.en: -[Rosé laughs] -My eyes.
translation.zh: 我的眼睛

translation.en: [Rosé] My eyes.
translation.zh: 我的眼睛

translation.en: -[in Korean] It's really pretty. -[Lisa] Wow!
translation.zh: 真的好漂亮！

translation.en: Here, stand here.
translation.zh: 这里 站在这里

translation.en: [in English] One, two…
translation.zh: 一 二…

translation.en: -Nice. -I wanna have a look.
translation.zh: -很好-给我看一下

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] After my Korean classes on the fifth floor,
translation.zh: 我在五楼上完韩语课之后

translation.en: I took the elevators to the basement.
translation.zh: 我坐电梯到地下室

translation.en: And there was this girl
translation.zh: 有一个女孩

translation.en: with short hair, tied back.
translation.zh: 短发 扎在后面

translation.en: It was kind of awkward.
translation.zh: 有点尴尬

translation.en: -I was nervous. -I'm sure you were nervous.
translation.zh: -我当时很紧张-你当时肯定很紧张

translation.en: [in English] So weird. [in Korean] I was like, "Oh! A new girl?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“啊！新来的女孩？”

translation.en: -[Rosé laughs] -I was like… so wary of competition.
translation.zh: -我当时很害怕竞争-对 害怕竞争

translation.en: -[in Korean] Right. Competition. -Competition, it's so competitive.
translation.zh: -我当时很害怕竞争-对 害怕竞争 很害怕竞争

translation.en: [in English] Everything was gyeongjaeng at that time.
translation.zh: 当时全都是竞争

translation.en: She thought I was competition, and I was just really intimidated.
translation.zh: 她当时觉得我是竞争对手我非常害怕

translation.en: Like, everybody is so good.
translation.zh: 大家都太厉害了

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] We were the same age,
translation.zh: 我们年龄相仿

translation.en: and we had similar tastes.
translation.zh: 品味相似

translation.en: [in Korean] Since we both came from another country,
translation.zh: 因为我们都从外国来 所以当我们有困难时

translation.en: we relied on each other when we were having a hard time.
translation.zh: 就会互相依靠

translation.en: [in Thai] We become like two peas in a pod.
translation.zh: 我们变得形影不离

translation.en: We were like genuine twins.
translation.zh: 真的就像双胞胎一样

translation.en: [Rosé in English] We have so many days where we walk out, and we're wearing the same thing.
translation.zh: 很多时候我们出去 穿同样的衣服

translation.en: [in Korean] And during our days off, we'd always be together.
translation.zh: 放假的时候 我们总会在一起

translation.en: [in English] She started getting an Australian accent.
translation.zh: 她当时开始有澳洲口音了

translation.en: See, she still has it sometimes.
translation.zh: 她现在有的时候还是有

translation.en: [in Australian accent] No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: -Yeah. -No.
translation.zh: -有的-没有

translation.en: [giggles] I don't even know how to say--
translation.zh: 我都不知道该怎么说了…

translation.en: I never knew I would live in Korea.
translation.zh: 我从没想到自己会在韩国生活

translation.en: Then all of a sudden at 16, I'm like… Now Korea is my home.
translation.zh: 突然 在16岁的时候我心想：“现在韩国是我的家了”

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Was it hard for you? [in English] Of course.
translation.zh: -当时你觉得很困难吗？-当然

translation.en: Even though you have me?
translation.zh: 即便有我陪你？

translation.en: You?
translation.zh: 你？

translation.en: You're not any help.
translation.zh: 你根本没用的

translation.en: I'm joking. [giggles]
translation.zh: 开玩笑的

translation.en: -Yeah, 'cause I grew up with a sister. -Mm.
translation.zh: 嗯 因为我从小长大有一个姐妹

translation.en: Think about not having a sister.
translation.zh: 想想姐妹不在了

translation.en: But Lisa was there.
translation.zh: 但是有拉莉莎在

translation.en: [in Korean] When I was having a hard time, I'd look at Rosé, and she'd be the same.
translation.zh: 当我很难受的时候我会看看彩英 她也一样

translation.en: [in English] I thought I was really sad, but I'd look at you, and I'd go, "Okay."
translation.zh: 我当时以为自己很惨但我看看你 心里就平衡了

translation.en: I think what makes K-pop K-pop is the time that we spend as a trainee.
translation.zh: 我想韩国流行音乐之所以能成为韩国流行音乐 是因为我们作为练习生所花的时间

translation.en: We all live together, sort of like a boarding school,
translation.zh: （受训六年、五年、四年、五年） 我们都住在一起 有点像寄宿学校

translation.en: like a training version.
translation.zh: 练习生版

translation.en: [Rosé] I think there were nine girls.
translation.zh: 当时应该是有九个女孩

translation.en: They were planning on creating a big group,
translation.zh: 他们当时计划做一个大组合

translation.en: so they had a lot of girls there.
translation.zh: 所以当时有很多女孩

translation.en: [Jennie] They need you to be at their standard in every single subject.
translation.zh: 她们需要在每一科都达到标准

translation.en: [in Korean] For me, there were so many lessons in the beginning.
translation.zh: 我一开始有很多课程

translation.en: I took three to four dancing lessons a day and practiced.
translation.zh: 我每天上三四节舞蹈课 还要练习

translation.en: I had vocal lessons from two to three teachers.
translation.zh: 我跟两三名老师上声乐课

translation.en: It was a rough time.
translation.zh: 当时很辛苦

translation.en: [Rosé in English] We'd get a day off every fortnight,
translation.zh: 我们每两周休息一天

translation.en: and then practice again for another 13 days.
translation.zh: 然后再练习13天

translation.en: So 14 hours a day just training. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 一天训练14个小时

translation.en: [Teddy] It's not easy,
translation.zh: 不容易

translation.en: the repetition.
translation.zh: 不断地重复

translation.en: But at such a young age, they are able to absorb all the techniques and the tools
translation.zh: 但是在这么小的年龄时他们能够吸收所有技巧和工具

translation.en: that they need for their next ten years.
translation.zh: 这些东西在他们未来的十年是需要的

translation.en: [Rosé] There's this basic routine you have to learn in dancing.
translation.zh: 在舞蹈中有一些基本的常规动作要学

translation.en: Jennie was like, "The first thing you have to learn is that,
translation.zh: 珍妮说：“你首先要学这个

translation.en: and I'll just teach you the first moves."
translation.zh: 我会教你最先要学的一些动作”

translation.en: And she was like, "Do this." And I was like, "I don't know how."
translation.zh: 她说：“这样做”我说：“我不知道怎么做”

translation.en: [Lisa] I can still remember the first day that you had a dance lesson.
translation.zh: 我还记得你第一天上舞蹈课的样子

translation.en: -[laughs] -'Cause I'd never danced in my life.
translation.zh: 因为当时我从没跳过舞

translation.en: It was cute.
translation.zh: 好可爱

translation.en: If you ask a 16-year-old to dance for the first time,
translation.zh: 如果你让一个16岁的孩子第一次跳舞

translation.en: it's the funniest thing. I looked like a…
translation.zh: 那是最搞笑的 我就想一个…

translation.en: And then after that, I got so angry at myself.
translation.zh: 之后 我非常生我自己的气

translation.en: I was like, "I am going to become like Lisa."
translation.zh: 我心想：“我要变成像拉莉莎那样”

translation.en: 'Cause Lisa was the dancer. She was like… She was at the top.
translation.zh: 因为拉莉莎跳舞非常好当时是跳得最好的

translation.en: [Rosé] At the end of every month, our boss and all the producers would come,
translation.zh: 每个月月底我们的老板和所有制作人会来

translation.en: and we'd perform a solo song, a group song, and a group choreography.
translation.zh: 我们会表演一首独唱一首合唱、一支团体舞

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] For that, we'd have to plan everything ourselves,
translation.zh: 为了这个 我们得自己安排好一切

translation.en: but we each had a role.
translation.zh: 但我们每个人只有一个角色

translation.en: If someone was in charge of vocals, we'd give them that role,
translation.zh: 如果谁负责唱歌我们就会把这个角色给她

translation.en: but I always took on the role of the dancer.
translation.zh: 但是我总是拿跳舞这个角色

translation.en: So I'd always design the choreography.
translation.zh: 所以我总会进行编舞

translation.en: Every month! Literally every month
translation.zh: 每个月 真的是每个月

translation.en: for five years.
translation.zh: 五年都是如此

translation.en: [Lisa] After a monthly review, you would be graded.
translation.zh: 每次月度考察之后 就会给你打分

translation.en: You had those who got an A, those with Bs and those with Cs.
translation.zh: 有人得A、有人得B、有人得C

translation.en: [Jennie in English] I remember having to send a good friend of mine home every month
translation.zh: 我记得每个月都要送一个好朋友回家

translation.en: because they got eliminated from the test.
translation.zh: 因为他们在测试中被淘汰了

translation.en: There were so many rules, so many things to just be like,
translation.zh: 有很多规定

translation.en: "Okay, they don't like this. They don't like that."
translation.zh: 他们这也看不惯 那也看不惯

translation.en: Everything that I did was wrong.
translation.zh: 我做什么都是错的

translation.en: [Jennie] Being told that I'm not good at stuff face-to-face
translation.zh: 当面对我说我不行

translation.en: and trying to keep everything together when I hear those things…
translation.zh: 听到这些话的时候 我还是要坚持住

translation.en: It's really harsh.
translation.zh: 非常严厉

translation.en: It wasn't a very happy vibe.
translation.zh: 当时的气氛并不快乐

translation.en: We're not allowed to drink, or smoke, or get a tattoo.
translation.zh: 我们不准喝酒、抽烟、纹身

translation.en: [in Korean] I rarely went home and had to practice on the weekends.
translation.zh: 我当时很少回家 周末也要练习

translation.en: So my parents were quite upset and worried.
translation.zh: 所以我父母很不高兴 很担心

translation.en: But they're not really…
translation.zh: 但他们

translation.en: the protective, overbearing type,
translation.zh: 但他们不是那种情感外露的人

translation.en: and they knew this was something that I had to do,
translation.zh: 他们知道这是我必须做的事

translation.en: so they told me to stay strong and get it done.
translation.zh: 所以他们对我说要坚强要把事情做好

translation.en: …and I would always call her and tell her, "Mom, it's so hard."
translation.zh: 我总给她打电话说：“妈 好辛苦啊”

translation.en: She'd say, "Come home." I'd say, "No."
translation.zh: 她会说：“回家吧” 我说：“不”

translation.en: My dad sent me, and he was like, "Rosé, come home."
translation.zh: 是我爸送我来的他说：“彩英 回家吧”

translation.en: He's like, "We want you back home."
translation.zh: 他说：“我们要你回家”

translation.en: And I hated that. I hated it whenever they would say, "Come home."
translation.zh: 我很讨厌这样他们说要我回家 我很讨厌

translation.en: That was the last thing I wanted to hear.
translation.zh: 我最不想听这句话

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] I started a bit later than the others,
translation.zh: 我比其他人起步晚一点

translation.en: so I was able to make memories with friends and go to school.
translation.zh: 所以我能有和朋友们的回忆 能上学

translation.en: I consider it a blessing now.
translation.zh: 我现在觉得这很宝贵

translation.en: [Jennie] I don't regret spending time as a trainee, learning how to dance, how to sing.
translation.zh: 我不后悔花时间做练习生学习唱歌跳舞

translation.en: But one thing I wish is to maybe have lived at home
translation.zh: 但是我倒是希望 自己能在家生活到十八九岁

translation.en: until I was like 18, 19.
translation.zh: 自己能在家生活到十八九岁

translation.en: A lot of people make lots of memories as a high school student.
translation.zh: 很多人在高中有很多回忆

translation.en: But I never had that.
translation.zh: 但是我没有这个机会

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Waiting was the hardest part.
translation.zh: 等待是最艰难的

translation.en: [in Thai] I didn't think I would make it. I was on the verge of letting it go.
translation.zh: 我不知道什么时候自己能成功 当时我在放弃的边缘

translation.en: [in English] It was just days on end with just a bunch of girls
translation.zh: 一天到晚和一群女孩在一起

translation.en: not knowing where this was going.
translation.zh: 不知道以后会怎么样

translation.en: [in Korean] I'd ask myself,
translation.zh: 我会问自己

translation.en: "Do you want to give up because it's not easy?"
translation.zh: “你希望因为不容易就放弃吗？”

translation.en: [Jennie in English] I knew I could do it.
translation.zh: 我当时就知道我能坚持

translation.en: The tougher they treated me,
translation.zh: 他们对我越严厉

translation.en: I'm like, "I'm gonna get through it,
translation.zh: 我心想：“我会挺过去

translation.en: and I'm gonna show them that I'm worth it."
translation.zh: 我会让他们看到 我是值得的”

translation.en: [Rosé] After all of this, I'm not gonna go back without doing anything.
translation.zh: 经历了这么多我不会一事无成地回去

translation.en: That would be embarrassing for me. That's what I thought.
translation.zh: 那对我来说太难堪了我当时就是这么想的

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] I had to keep fighting. I had to give it my all.
translation.zh: 我必须坚持下去 必须全力以赴

translation.en: "I don't care how long the training will take."
translation.zh: “我不管还要训练多久

translation.en: "Bring it on! I don't care about that anymore!"
translation.zh: 放马来吧！我现在无所谓了！”

translation.en: [Jennie in English] So, the CEO would put us
translation.zh: 所以 社长每两个月会把我们放到不同的组合里

translation.en: into different groups every other month just to see.
translation.zh: 所以 社长每两个月会把我们放到不同的组合里 就为了看看情况

translation.en: And there was a point where he pointed the four of us out.
translation.zh: 有一次他点了我们四个人出来

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] We were evaluated together,
translation.zh: 我们一起被进行评价

translation.en: and the four of us did screen tests
translation.zh: 我们四个上镜测试

translation.en: and recorded demos together.
translation.zh: 并一起录了样带

translation.en: [Lisa] It happened naturally.
translation.zh: 过程很自然

translation.en: We just clicked.
translation.zh: 我们很合拍

translation.en: [Jennie] We just got along so well.
translation.zh: 我们相处得非常好

translation.en: Because usually there's like, "Oh, I wanna sing more."
translation.zh: 因为通常会出现这样的情况“噢 我想多唱一点”

translation.en: Or, "Oh, I wanna be in the middle."
translation.zh: 或者“噢 我想站在当中”

translation.en: There's always those little fights going on in the groups.
translation.zh: 在组合里 总会有各种小争斗

translation.en: But when it was the four of us, it was clear what we were doing.
translation.zh: 但是我们四个的分工非常明确

translation.en: And that's what made it possible for us to be in a group.
translation.zh: 这使我们能够组成一个组合

translation.en: You know, four girls being in one group is not easy.
translation.zh: 一个组合里有四个女孩并不容易

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] When you're working in a group,
translation.zh: 在一个组合里工作的时候

translation.en: everyone has their place and a role.
translation.zh: 我看到每一个人都有自己的位置和角色

translation.en: And when everyone settles into their roles,
translation.zh: 每一个人都有机会发光发亮

translation.en: that's how synergy is born.
translation.zh: 协同效应就是这样产生的

translation.en: That realization changed my outlook. When everyone is where they need to be,
translation.zh: 实现这一点改变了我的看法 当每个人都在应该在的位置的时候

translation.en: big things can happen.
translation.zh: 就可能办成大事

translation.en: [Teddy] When I first came in the picture, there were seven, eight, nine girls.
translation.zh: 我刚参与的时候有七个、八个还是九个女孩

translation.en: Then we started cutting some songs,
translation.zh: 然后我们开始录一些歌

translation.en: and sonically, whatever that sounded the best.
translation.zh: 从声音上来说只要声音效果最好就行

translation.en: The four girls right now, the combination.
translation.zh: 现在的四个女孩 这个组合

translation.en: And of course you start looking at their individuality,
translation.zh: 当然 你会开始看她们的个性

translation.en: like their character.
translation.zh: 她们的品质

translation.en: The four of them just felt right.
translation.zh: 她们四个感觉对了

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Teddy felt like a CEO to us.
translation.zh: 洪俊就像社长一样

translation.en: If somebody did something with Teddy or met with Teddy…
translation.zh: 如果有人和洪俊一起做了什么事或者见了洪俊一面

translation.en: [gasps] …it was considered to be a big deal.
translation.zh: 就被认为是很大的一件事

translation.en: [Lisa] I didn't know much about him.
translation.zh: 我当时不太了解他

translation.en: I knew he was a 1TYM member.
translation.zh: 我当时知道他曾是1TYM的成员

translation.en: [Teddy in English] It's a different time,
translation.zh: 那是一个不同的时代

translation.en: and I just wanted to become someone that I needed when I was young.
translation.zh: 我当时只是想要成为我年轻时需要的一个人

translation.en: I didn't have somebody that's a little more outside looking in,
translation.zh: 我当时没有一个局外的旁观者

translation.en: telling me where to go.
translation.zh: 告诉我该往哪里走

translation.en: [in Korean] The first time we met was when-- [Jisoo] When I was a trainee.
translation.zh: -我们头一次见面是在我们…-我当时还是练习生

translation.en: [in English] I was so nervous. I couldn't really talk to him.
translation.zh: 我当时很紧张 都没办法和他说话

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] Meeting you was like the final stage of the debut.
translation.zh: 和你见面有点像出道的最后一个步骤

translation.en: You were the final boss. If we meet you, we get to debut. [Lisa] You're right.
translation.zh: 你是最终的老大！如果我们和你见面 就能出道了！

translation.en: Oppa, do you remember…
translation.zh: 哥哥 你还记得吗？

translation.en: how we had to record that whistling sound 1,000 times?
translation.zh: 那个口哨声录了一千遍？

translation.en: -[in English] That I'll never forget. -[girls laughing]
translation.zh: 我永远忘不了

translation.en: I cannot forget that.
translation.zh: 那件事我是忘不了的

translation.en: And we almost didn't come out with "Whistle" for our debut song, but--
translation.zh: 我们差点没用《口哨》作为出道歌曲 但是…

translation.en: [Teddy] Too many people thought it was risky.
translation.zh: 太多人觉得风险太大

translation.en: But last minute, we were like, "It has to be that one."
translation.zh: 但是最后时刻我们觉得一定要是这首歌

translation.en: [Teddy] 'Cause it has this weird country vibe to it, and it's super minimal.
translation.zh: 这首歌有奇怪的乡村感觉而且特别细微

translation.en: It just sounded too empty for a lot of people.
translation.zh: 对很多人来说听起来太空了

translation.en: Most people were against it. We just pushed forward, whatever.
translation.zh: 多数人反对但是我们没管它 就是这样往前推进

translation.en: Hey, you know that photo there?
translation.zh: 哎 你们知道那张照片吗？

translation.en: That's our very first photo session as BLACKPINK.
translation.zh: 那是我们作为BLACKPINK的头一次照片拍摄

translation.en: [Jennie] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: It's oppa's favorite photo.
translation.zh: 是哥哥最喜欢的照片

translation.en: As soon as I saw that photo, how it turned out, I was like,
translation.zh: 我一看到那张照片的效果 我心想：“噢 会非常有意思的”

translation.en: "Oh, this is gonna be fun."
translation.zh: 我心想：“噢 会非常有意思的”

translation.en: [reporter 1 in Korean] YG Entertainment is expected to showcase its first new girl group in seven years since 2NE1 debuted.
translation.zh: 自2NE1出道之后YG娱乐将会推出七年来首个新女团

translation.en: [reporter 2] Under the direction of producer Teddy,
translation.zh: 在制作人朴洪俊的指导下

translation.en: this new group is being prepared.
translation.zh: 这个新组合正在进行准备

translation.en: Its members and debut songs have been shrouded in secrecy.
translation.zh: 其成员和出道歌曲被严格保密

translation.en: I'm shaking!
translation.zh: 我在颤抖！

translation.en: -So shaky! -[staff laughing]
translation.zh: 好抖啊！

translation.en: "Various… diverse colors…"
translation.zh: “很多…多彩的颜色…”

translation.en: [sighs] How does it go?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: [in English] All I wanted was people to see the potential in us.
translation.zh: 我当时只希望大家看到我们的潜力

translation.en: It didn't necessarily have to be, "Wow! This group came out,
translation.zh: 不用一推出大家就说：“哇！这个组合出来了

translation.en: and they're so perfect in every single way."
translation.zh: 她们各方面都好完美啊！”

translation.en: Like, I wanted people to be curious about us.
translation.zh: 我希望大家对我们很好奇

translation.en: [in Korean] Hello everyone.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: I'm BLACKPINK's Rosé.
translation.zh: 我是BLACKPINK的彩英

translation.en: Hello everyone. I'm BLACKPINK's Jennie.
translation.zh: 大家好 我是BLACKPINK的珍妮

translation.en: Hello everyone.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: I'm BLACKPINK's Jisoo.
translation.zh: 我是BLACKPINK的智秀

translation.en: Hello everyone. I'm BLACKPINK's Lisa.
translation.zh: 大家好 我是BLACKPINK的拉莉莎

translation.en: Uh… after training with my members all this time
translation.zh: 在和我的成员们一起训练这么久之后

translation.en: and finally being able to debut on this stage,
translation.zh: 终于能够在这个舞台上出道

translation.en: I'm nervous and excited.
translation.zh: 我既紧张又激动

translation.en: In the future, we will work hard to show everyone BLACKPINK's unique colors.
translation.zh: 未来 我们会努力地向大家展示BLACKPINK的独特色彩

translation.en: Please love us!
translation.zh: 请爱我们吧！

translation.en: [all together] Thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢大家！

translation.en: [in English] As soon as we debuted…
translation.zh: 我们一出道

translation.en: [in Korean] …I think it happened just the way I thought it would.
translation.zh: 发生的情况应该说和我预想的一样

translation.en: [in English] Let's go!
translation.zh: 咱们来吧

translation.en: [all together in Korean] Hello.
translation.zh: -你好！-你好！

translation.en: I can't wait. Can you tell us who's performing next?
translation.zh: 我等不及了 下一个节目谁要来表演呢？

translation.en: Two of their songs debuted exclusively at Inkigayo last week
translation.zh: 她们两首歌曲上周在《人气歌谣》独家出道表演

translation.en: and could be number one!
translation.zh: 可能排第一！

translation.en: [man] Shall we see the performance of BLACKPINK, the hottest rookies right now?
translation.zh: 咱们来看一下当前最热的菜鸟BLACKPINK的表演吧？

translation.en: -Music… -…start!
translation.zh: -音乐…-响起！

translation.en: [reporter 3 in Korean] YG's new girl group, BLACKPINK,
translation.zh: YG娱乐的新女团BLACKPINK

translation.en: has reached number one only 14 days after their debut,
translation.zh: 出道仅4天就排名第一

translation.en: which is the shortest time ever by a girl group to reach number one.
translation.zh: 这是女团登顶的最短时间纪录

translation.en: [Jisoo] I remember making our debut and winning awards.
translation.zh: 我记得我们出道和得奖时的情况

translation.en: [in English] Wow!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: [in Korean] And feeling like, "Wow! We did it."
translation.zh: 心想：“哇！我们成功了！”

translation.en: [Jisoo] "Whistle" kept going up and up, and when it hit number one,
translation.zh: 《口哨》不断往上走 当上到排名第一的时候

translation.en: we were just so happy and excited.
translation.zh: 我们非常高兴和激动

translation.en: [Jennie] Honestly, I think I was most surprised when "Whistle" reached number one on the music charts.
translation.zh: 说实话 《口哨》在音乐榜排第一我是有点吃惊的

translation.en: That was the most exciting.
translation.zh: 当时我最激动

translation.en: [in English] I remember we were…
translation.zh: 我记得我们当时在练习房

translation.en: [in Korean] …in a practice room when we heard the news
translation.zh: 我记得我们当时在练习房 听到新闻说我们在榜上排第二了

translation.en: that we were number two.
translation.zh: 听到新闻说我们在榜上排第二了

translation.en: I kept on checking and checking, but we had to go to practice.
translation.zh: 我不断地去看 但是我们还得去练习

translation.en: We'd check every hour.
translation.zh: 我们每小时看一次

translation.en: And then someone came in and said, "Oh, my God!"
translation.zh: 然后有人进来说：“天哪！”

translation.en: [in English] We jumped up and down.
translation.zh: 我记得我们都跳上跳下

translation.en: [in Korean] I remember my friends telling me that they heard it.
translation.zh: 我记得我的朋友们告诉我说他们听了歌

translation.en: They were like, "I'm outside, and they're playing your song!"
translation.zh: 他们说：“我在外面他们在放你的歌！”

translation.en: It felt really weird back then.
translation.zh: 我当时觉得非常奇怪

translation.en: I was like, "Oh, my God, that's so cool! Shoot a video! Send me the video!"
translation.zh: 我心想：“天哪！好酷啊！拍视频！把视频发给我！”

translation.en: [in English] Lisa! I love you!
translation.zh: 拉莉莎！我爱你！

translation.en: [fan 1] I just really like their style.
translation.zh: 我真的非常喜欢她们的风格

translation.en: Their sound is super different from other K-pop groups.
translation.zh: 她们的声音和其他韩国流行音乐组合很不一样

translation.en: [fan 2] It's 'cause they have so many foreign members,
translation.zh: 因为她们有很多外国成员

translation.en: and it really shows how anyone can achieve their dreams.
translation.zh: 真的让大家看到每个人都能够实现自己的梦想

translation.en: [fan 3] They own the stage when they're on it.
translation.zh: 在舞台上时 她们就是舞台的主宰

translation.en: [in Korean] Their dance is so powerful.
translation.zh: 她们的舞蹈很有力量

translation.en: [in Dutch] When their music is played, you just instantly start dancing.
translation.zh: 播放她们的音乐时你立即就会跳起舞来

translation.en: [in English] They have the strongest friendship I've seen in a K-pop group.
translation.zh: 她们之间的感情是我见过韩国流行音乐组合里最好的

translation.en: [in Spanish] You can see they love what they are doing and are born to do it.
translation.zh: 你可以看到 她们喜欢自己所做的事而且很有天赋

translation.en: [in English] I felt like this is a girl group that I can actually vibe with.
translation.zh: 我觉得这个女团和我有共鸣

translation.en: [in English] You know, they cool.
translation.zh: 她们很酷

translation.en: They the baddest bitches alive. [laughs]
translation.zh: 她们是最牛的！

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] When I was a trainee, nobody knew about me.
translation.zh: 我是练习生的时候 没人知道我

translation.en: But after I debuted as BLACKPINK,
translation.zh: 但是我在BLACKPINK出道之后

translation.en: everyone would follow me no matter where I went.
translation.zh: 我去哪里都有很多人跟着我

translation.en: I didn't know that we would become this famous.
translation.zh: 我之前没想到我们会这么出名

translation.en: [Rosé in English] How much did you sleep last night?
translation.zh: 你昨晚睡了多久？

translation.en: [in Korean] Three hours.
translation.zh: 三小时

translation.en: -[in English] Three hours? -Yup.
translation.zh: -三小时？-对

translation.en: -[staff 1 in Korean] Clear in front. -[staff 2] Everybody get out.
translation.zh: -前面清场-大家都离开

translation.en: [Rosé in English] During trainee days, I was desperate. I really wanted it.
translation.zh: 在当练习生的日子里 我急得要命非常想要出道

translation.en: But after debut, that's when you start getting a lot of responsibilities.
translation.zh: 但是出道之后你开始要承担很多责任

translation.en: [man in Korean] Everybody look into the camera.
translation.zh: 大家都看镜头

translation.en: [Jisoo] Then came the pressure for our next thing. "What now? What do we do?"
translation.zh: 然后就是我们下一步的压力“现在该怎么办？我们该怎么做？

translation.en: "Let's come up with something fresh." I felt like we were being chased.
translation.zh: 咱们想点新点子吧”我感觉我们在被追着跑

translation.en: [director in English] Action!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: [in Korean] The winner is BLACKPINK!
translation.zh: 得奖的是 BLACKPINK！

translation.en: Thank you! I love you all!
translation.zh: 谢谢！我爱你们！

translation.en: [reporter 1 in English] It's a big day for BLACKPINK
translation.zh: 这是BLACKPINK的大日子

translation.en: as "Ddu-Du Ddu-Du" has become the most viewed Korean music video in 24 hours.
translation.zh: 《Ddu-Du Ddu-Du》在24小时内成为观看次数最多的韩国音乐视频

translation.en: [reporter 2] Three music videos with over 400 million views.
translation.zh: 三个音乐视频 观看次数超过四亿

translation.en: [reporter 3] One billion views on YouTube.
translation.zh: YouTube上观看次数达到十亿

translation.en: [Rosé] I think when things get faster,
translation.zh: 我想 当事情发展更快的时候

translation.en: it also becomes very overwhelming at some points.
translation.zh: 也会在某些时候变得令人难以招架

translation.en: [inhales] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] I still remember the first time…
translation.zh: 我还记得第一次…

translation.en: [Lisa] I went back to Thailand after my debut.
translation.zh: 我在出道后第一次回泰国

translation.en: Because Thai teens see me as a Thai who has made it this far.
translation.zh: 因为在泰国的男生女生眼里 我是取得了现在这样成绩的泰国人

translation.en: They would say, "I want to be like Lisa."
translation.zh: 他们会说：“我要像拉莉莎一样”

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Lisa!
translation.zh: 拉莉莎！

translation.en: WELCOME HOME LISA WE MISSED YOU
translation.zh: （欢迎回家 拉莉莎知道我们多么想念你吗？）

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] But at that moment,
translation.zh: 但是在那一刻 我不太确定

translation.en: I wasn't sure if I was really good enough to be their role model.
translation.zh: 但是在那一刻 我不太确定 自己是否真的足够好可以做他们的榜样

translation.en: [in Korean] I'm a singer… but I didn't know what kind of singer I wanted to be.
translation.zh: 我是一名歌手但是我想成为什么样的歌手呢？

translation.en: I kind of lost the goal. I was trying to find myself.
translation.zh: 我当时有点丧失了目标我想要找到我自己

translation.en: [in Thai] Could I really become their role model?
translation.zh: 我真的能成为他们的榜样吗？

translation.en: What should I do to not let them down?
translation.zh: 我怎么样做才能不让他们失望？

translation.en: These kinds of thoughts kept running through my mind.
translation.zh: 我脑子里一直在想这种问题

translation.en: [Jennie in English] We need sugar. [in singsong voice] We need sugar.
translation.zh: -我们需要糖-我们需要糖

translation.en: -[Jisoo] One spoon. -One spoon.
translation.zh: -一勺-一勺

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] You like this too. Tanghulu is different.
translation.zh: 不过你也喜欢吃这个 糖葫芦不一样

translation.en: [Jennie] Tanghulu has the sweetness of the fruits.
translation.zh: 糖葫芦有水果的甜味

translation.en: The ratio is a little off because we haven't made it in a while.
translation.zh: 比例有点不对因为我们有一段时间没做了

translation.en: -There was too much sugar. -It's a bit burnt.
translation.zh: 太多糖了

translation.en: -It still looks delicious. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 看起来很美味

translation.en: [in English] This is actually a Chinese traditional snack,
translation.zh: 这其实是传统的中国小吃

translation.en: but it's hard to find it here in Korea.
translation.zh: 不过在韩国这里很难找到

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] We almost started a fire once.
translation.zh: 我们有一次差点弄着火了

translation.en: -We were making too much. -Yeah, we almost burnt it.
translation.zh: -我们过头-对 差点烧焦

translation.en: We almost made this dorm disappear. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们差点把宿舍搞没了

translation.en: [Jennie in English] This is a way of me teaching Jisoo to speak English.
translation.zh: 这是我教智秀说英语的一种方式

translation.en: She got better in the last six months.
translation.zh: 她在过去半年中有进步

translation.en: She understands everything that I say, so I do talk to her in English sometimes.
translation.zh: 我说什么她都懂所以我有时候用英语和她说话

translation.en: -[Jennie in Korean] How is it? -Mm.
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: Is it good? I want a taste. It's warm.
translation.zh: -好吃吗？我要尝一下-热的

translation.en: It's a bit burnt.
translation.zh: 有点焦了

translation.en: [in English] Not bad.
translation.zh: 不难吃

translation.en: Not bad but not good.
translation.zh: 不难吃 但是也不好吃

translation.en: Yeah. Let's be honest. It was a fail. Yes.
translation.zh: -对 咱们说实话 做失败了-对

translation.en: [in Korean] No. We didn't add any water.
translation.zh: 没有 我们没有加水

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -No, you don't add water.
translation.zh: -你说什么啊？-你没加水

translation.en: Unnie! You add water.
translation.zh: 姐！要加水

translation.en: You add water? No, you don't add water.
translation.zh: 要加水？不对 不能加水

translation.en: What am I going to do about you? Nothing works without me.
translation.zh: 我能拿你怎么办？哎 没有我什么都搞不成

translation.en: [in English] In Korea, one of the first things you ask, other than your name, is how old are you?
translation.zh: 在韩国 除了名字之外第一个问的就是年龄

translation.en: And as soon as they say they're older, it's like, "Oh, you're unnie."
translation.zh: 当别人说自己比你年龄大时你就要叫别人“欧尼”

translation.en: So, unnie is basically what you call an older sister.
translation.zh: 对姐姐就要称呼“欧尼”

translation.en: It's like--
translation.zh: 就像…

translation.en: [in Korean] Other places don't have it.
translation.zh: 其他国家没有这种说法

translation.en: [in English] We don't call each other by names.
translation.zh: 我们不互相叫名字

translation.en: It's normally unnie if you're older than me, and oppa if you're a guy.
translation.zh: 如果你比我年龄大 就要叫你“欧尼”如果你是男的 就要叫你“欧巴”

translation.en: It takes a while to get used to, but once you get a hold of it,
translation.zh: 喜欢这个要花一段时间 但是一旦掌握了

translation.en: it's better than calling their names.
translation.zh: 其实比叫名字好

translation.en: She's not Jisoo. She's unnie.
translation.zh: 不叫她智秀 叫她“欧尼”

translation.en: It's like family, in a way.
translation.zh: 从某种角度看 就像家人一样

translation.en: [in Korean] When I first came to train as a singer,
translation.zh: 我刚来当练习生的时候

translation.en: I had never tried singing or dancing before.
translation.zh: 我在之前从来没尝试过唱歌或者跳舞

translation.en: I was lost, but you taught me a lot.
translation.zh: 我当时很迷惘 但是你教了我很多

translation.en: For two of us, it was-- The competition was fierce at the time.
translation.zh: 对我们俩来说 真是… 当时的竞争很激烈

translation.en: There were about 20 to 30 trainees.
translation.zh: 当时有大概二三十个练习生

translation.en: Because we are the older ones of the group,
translation.zh: 因为我们年级比其他人大

translation.en: the others came to us with the issues they were having.
translation.zh: 所有其他人有问题就会来找我们

translation.en: I knew what their problems were. They'd ask us, "Unnie, what should we do?"
translation.zh: 我知道她们有什么问题 她们会问我们“姐 我们该怎么办啊？”

translation.en: And I'd advise them to speak their mind, but they have a hard time doing that,
translation.zh: 我会建议她们说出自己的想法但她们不太能做到

translation.en: so I end up taking care of it.
translation.zh: 于是最后还是我帮她们解决

translation.en: There's no doubt I feel a sense of responsibility.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 我感受到了责任

translation.en: I try the best I can to take care of the other girls.
translation.zh: 我尽我所能去照顾其他女孩

translation.en: [in English] It's okay, actually. I could eat this.
translation.zh: 其实还行 我可以吃这个

translation.en: [in Korean] Semi-success.
translation.zh: 半成功

translation.en: [man in English] Okay. It's just Rosé and the beat.
translation.zh: 好的 只有彩英和节拍

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -No words, no melody whatsoever.
translation.zh: -神啊！-没有歌词 也没有曲调

translation.en: [man] So here we go.
translation.zh: 咱们开始吧

translation.en: [Rosé] You know how when people say they're afraid of heights
translation.zh: 有的人说怕高

translation.en: or they're afraid of water?
translation.zh: 有的人说怕水

translation.en: I've always been so afraid of getting in the studio or writing something.
translation.zh: 我总是很害怕进工作室 害怕写东西

translation.en: I always thought just someday I have to just start it. I have to.
translation.zh: 我一直觉得有一天我要开始做 必须这样

translation.en: -I'm gonna still keep this one. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我还是会保留这个-好的

translation.en: -Let's try one more time. -Okay.
translation.zh: -咱们再试一次-好的

translation.en: Do I change the rhythm? I keep going for the same thing.
translation.zh: 我要改节奏吗？我一直在唱一样的

translation.en: -Do you feel uncomfortable singing it? -Do I feel uncomfortable singing it?
translation.zh: -这样唱你觉得不舒服吗？-这样唱我觉得不舒服吗？

translation.en: Like slightly. Maybe I'll try singing it one more time.
translation.zh: 有一点 要不我再尝试唱一次

translation.en: I've seen Joe a few times, and his music's like amazing.
translation.zh: 我见过乔几次 他的音乐非常棒

translation.en: I was just like, to Teddy, "What do you think if he helps me out?"
translation.zh: 我对洪俊说“你觉得他能帮到我吗？”

translation.en: So here's what we worked on. This is Rosé's first recorded song.
translation.zh: 这是我们做的项目这是彩英第一次录的歌

translation.en: [Rosé] We even saved this whole file in this secret folder
translation.zh: 我们甚至把这整个文件存在了秘密文件夹里

translation.en: because I said nobody can listen to it. I was like, "Hide it from everyone."
translation.zh: 因为我说谁都不能听我说：“藏起来 不能让别人发现”

translation.en: When it comes to writing songs, Rosé has certain stories in mind.
translation.zh: 在写歌的方面彩英头脑里有一些故事

translation.en: And she's shy about sharing that story. It's just super personal to her.
translation.zh: 她害羞 不想和别人说这对她来说是特别个人的东西

translation.en: It's like her diary.
translation.zh: 就像她的日记一样

translation.en: [Rosé laughs] Oh, my gosh!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: You sounded nervous in that one.
translation.zh: 你在这里面听起来很紧张

translation.en: Yeah. I'm like, "I don't know what I'm doing." [giggles]
translation.zh: 对 我好像不知道自己在干嘛

translation.en: I was thinking it'd be fun if I write something like…
translation.zh: 我在想 如果我写这样的东西会很好玩

translation.en: [sings in Korean] ♪ After two, three o’clock… ♪ ♪ When I call you ♪
translation.zh: 两三点后 当我给你打电话

translation.en: ♪ And when you see my call… ♪
translation.zh: 当你看到我的来电

translation.en: Something like that.
translation.zh: 就像这样的

translation.en: -I think it's fine. -I want to hide right now.
translation.zh: -我觉得挺好-我现在想藏起来

translation.en: -No. -I don't think I can do this. [laughs]
translation.zh: -不要-我觉得我不行

translation.en: [in English] Teddy told me yesterday too.
translation.zh: 洪俊昨天也跟我说了

translation.en: He was like, "You need to learn how to be more vulnerable in the studio."
translation.zh: 他说：“你得学会如何在工作室里更弱一点”

translation.en: That's something I can't do too easily, but I was gonna say--
translation.zh: 这件事我要做到不容易不过我本来打算说…

translation.en: -[Joe] I mean, it takes time. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -要花点时间-对

translation.en: I really have a lot of respect for music,
translation.zh: 我真的对音乐很尊敬

translation.en: so I don't wanna be just like another girl who sings
translation.zh: 我不希望像其他唱歌的女孩一样

translation.en: and just kind of tells everybody that she writes music.
translation.zh: 跟大家说自己会写音乐

translation.en: That's the last thing I wanna be.
translation.zh: 我最不希望这样

translation.en: -Whoa, I need one of these. -[Joe] Yeah.
translation.zh: -哇！我需要这个-对

translation.en: -[Rosé] Oh, my gosh. -[plays chords]
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: I feel more intimidated when I'm by myself.
translation.zh: 我自己一个人的时候 觉得更害怕

translation.en: When I'm in my room by myself,
translation.zh: 当我一个人在自己房间的时候

translation.en: and I go, "Should I try and write something?"
translation.zh: 我会想：“要不要试试写点什么呢？”

translation.en: I think I'm way more intimidated then.
translation.zh: 我觉得在这个时候我会害怕得多

translation.en: 'Cause it's just me. I don't know if my opinions are right,
translation.zh: 因为只有我在我不知道我的看法对不对

translation.en: and that scares me. I feel like I scare myself the most.
translation.zh: 这令我害怕我觉得我最令我自己害怕

translation.en: [Joe] Okay, let's record that.  What's our tempo?
translation.zh: 好的 咱们把这段录下来 什么拍子？

translation.en: I found these chords maybe like a month ago.
translation.zh: 这些调子 是我一个月前想到的

translation.en: I was like-- I liked it. I was like, "This sounds cool."
translation.zh: 我当时挺喜欢我心想：“听起来挺不错啊”

translation.en: And ever since then, I just play it.
translation.zh: 之后 我就会去弹

translation.en: [Joe] If anything, I was gonna put you in the booth and sing over it.
translation.zh: 我会让你进录音棚去唱出来

translation.en: [Rosé giggles] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Do you think I could do it? I've never tried this.
translation.zh: 你觉得我行吗？我从没试过这样

translation.en: [Joe] I think you can do it. Let's just give it a try.
translation.zh: 我觉得你行的 咱们试试看

translation.en: It's nice to have just the right amount of people in the room,
translation.zh: 房间里的人不多不少 非常好

translation.en: who are just there to accept whatever is there
translation.zh: 他们在这里 接受这一切

translation.en: and make it into something.
translation.zh: 想办法把它做出一点东西来

translation.en: Joe always says, "This is the safe ground. Everything's a secret in here."
translation.zh: 乔总是说：“这里是安全地带这里的一切都保密

translation.en: "You can make a fool out of yourself, and we won't tell anyone."
translation.zh: 你可以在这里犯傻 我们不会说出去”

translation.en: It feels just like expressing myself.
translation.zh: 感觉就像在表达自己

translation.en: Whereas I would always sing songs of other artists.
translation.zh: 我总会唱别人的歌

translation.en: That's more like borrowing their emotions and making it mine.
translation.zh: 那更像是借别人的情绪把它变成我自己的

translation.en: Whereas this is totally just speaking from my point of view.
translation.zh: 而这是完全在说我自己的观点

translation.en: I'm almost like a baby trying to speak in the music,
translation.zh: 我几乎就像一个宝宝想要用音乐来说话

translation.en: trying to sing… for the first time.
translation.zh: 想要第一次开口唱歌

translation.en: -[giggles] I lost it again. -[Joe] We got it.
translation.zh: -我又没弄好-没问题的

translation.en: [Jennie] Lisa, should I wear this on my way back?
translation.zh: 拉莉莎 我回去的时候要穿这个吗？

translation.en: [Rosé in Korean] Kuma!
translation.zh: 熊！

translation.en: [in English] BLACKPINK hoodie?
translation.zh: BLACKPINK连帽衫

translation.en: -I think you should. -[Jennie] Right?
translation.zh: -我觉得你应该穿-是吧？

translation.en: Hello. Ah, ow! You just bit me.  Coco bit me. Ah!
translation.zh: 你咬我！可可咬我！

translation.en: Coco like, "I don't care."
translation.zh: 可可说：“我才不管”

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] I have so many clothes, but there's not enough space,
translation.zh: 我有很多衣服 不过地方不够

translation.en: so I keep them on the balcony. [laughs]
translation.zh: 所以我放在阳台上

translation.en: Don't we have to pack for the event in Japan?
translation.zh: 咱们不用打包东西准备日本的活动吗？

translation.en: You have to bring something like this. It's cold.
translation.zh: 得带这种东西 很冷

translation.en: -Bring a scarf too. -Oh, I don't have a scarf!
translation.zh: -也带一条围巾-噢！我没有围巾！

translation.en: -Give me one. -You are funny.
translation.zh: -给我一条-你好搞笑

translation.en: -Give me one. -I can't.
translation.zh: -给我一条-不行

translation.en: That's not a scarf.
translation.zh: 这不是围巾

translation.en: It is so tiring when we work,
translation.zh: 我们工作的时候好累人啊

translation.en: but when we don't work, I get stressed out about not working.
translation.zh: 但是我们不工作的时候我会觉得不工作压力很大

translation.en: I think it's that. It's a dilemma.
translation.zh: 我觉得就是这样两难

translation.en: When we work, I really want to rest,
translation.zh: 我们工作的时候 我真的不想休息

translation.en: but when we don't work, I end up wondering, "What am I doing?"
translation.zh: 但是我们不工作的时候我会想：“我在干嘛？”

translation.en: [Rosé] This job has a lot of ups and downs. [Jisoo] There's nothing we can do about it.
translation.zh: -这份工作有很多起起伏伏-我们也没办法

translation.en: It's very random, and there's no regularity.
translation.zh: 非常随机 没有规则性

translation.en: The thing is, you can never tell how long this will last,
translation.zh: 问题是你永远不知道会红多久

translation.en: so estimating is impossible. That's most challenging.
translation.zh: 所以预测是不可能的这一点是最大的挑战

translation.en: [Jennie in English] This year has been on the road.
translation.zh: 今年一直在路上

translation.en: This year has been pack and unpack, and unpack and pack and unpack. That's a song.
translation.zh: -今年一直在打包、拆包-像一首歌

translation.en: [Jennie] At least right now, we're prepared enough to plan the resting part,
translation.zh: 至少 现在我们作好了充分准备去计划安排休息

translation.en: 'cause last year, we were just like spending time like…
translation.zh: 因为去年我们花时间就像…

translation.en: And then the tour hit us,
translation.zh: 然后巡回演唱会袭来

translation.en: and we're like, "Oh, my God." [Rosé] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们都心想：“神啊！” 对！-神啊！

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] I think we were together for three years before we went on the world tour.
translation.zh: 在举办世界巡回演唱会之前我们在一起三年

translation.en: [Jennie in English] It was a long tour, about nine months.
translation.zh: 巡回演唱会很长 大概九个月

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] We started the world tour in Asia,
translation.zh: 巡回演唱会从亚洲开始

translation.en: but Coachella marked the start of our tour in North America.
translation.zh: 但是科切拉音乐节标志着我们巡回演唱会在北美的开始

translation.en: [Rosé in English] When they said that we're gonna start going outside of Asia,
translation.zh: 当他们说我们要开始走出亚洲时

translation.en: that was like a dream.
translation.zh: 就像梦一样

translation.en: [in Korean] And blow them kisses here and stuff,
translation.zh: 给他们飞吻

translation.en: because you're coming out during the chorus before you kiss.
translation.zh: 因为在你飞吻之前你要从队伍里走出来

translation.en: Oh, the next chorus?
translation.zh: 哦 下一个队伍？

translation.en: You're coming out during the chorus before you kiss.
translation.zh: 你要在飞吻之前 从队伍里走出来

translation.en: You want me to come out before that chorus?
translation.zh: 你要我从队伍里走到前面？

translation.en: Come out slowly and play here.
translation.zh: 慢慢地走出来就行 在这里跳

translation.en: It was getting boring when you stay out there for too long.
translation.zh: 你在那里待太久会变得无趣

translation.en: [Lisa] A much more diverse group of fans
translation.zh: 一个更多样化的粉丝群体

translation.en: will be looking forward to seeing us.
translation.zh: 会期待看到我们
